content.body:

content.author: 姆蜜一雙藍黑狂暴巨雙炫劍擬招重砍一夏天仲玉模式
content.body: 嘿嘿嘿 27秒 還沒看懂

content.author: pokemon
content.body: So then. To everyone who has ever emailed to ask me for advice on writing, my answer is: get a deadline. That’s all you really need. Forget about luck. Don’t fret about talent. Just pay someone larger than you to kick your knees until they fold the wrong way if you don’t hand in 800 words by five o’clock. You’ll be amazed at what comes out.
